          <title>
            <string language="en">Production of calcium carbonate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Produktion des Kalziumkarbonats</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Production de carbonate de calcium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Produção do carbonato de cálcio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Produzione del carbonato di calcio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παραγωγή του ανθρακικού άλατος ασβεστίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Producción del carbonato de calcio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the reaction between carbon dioxide and lime-water. Calcium carbonate is produced in the form of white clouds.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lime-water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">test tube</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Reaktion zwischen 
Kohlendioxyd und Kalk-Wasser. Kalziumkarbonat wird in Form von 
weißen Wolken produziert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la réaction entre 
l'anhydride carbonique et la chaux-eau. Le carbonate de calcium 
est produit sous forme de nuages blancs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a reação entre o 
dióxido de carbono e a cal-água. O carbonato de cálcio é 
produzido no formulário das nuvens brancas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la reazione fra 
l'anidride carbonica e l'calce-acqua. Il carbonato di calcio è 
prodotto sotto forma di le nubi bianche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την αντίδραση μεταξύ του 
διοξειδίου του άνθρακα και του ασβέστης-ύδατος. Το 
ανθρακικό άλας ασβεστίου παράγεται υπό μορφή άσπρων σύννεφων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la reacción entre el 
bióxido de carbono y el cal-agua. El carbonato de calcio se 
produce en la forma de nubes blancas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kohlendioxyd</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalk-Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reaktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reagenzglas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">anhydride carbonique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la chaux-eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réaction</string>
          </keyword>
